messages.subject: Re: Parenting A Free Child
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/10/2006 4:36:58 PM Eastern Standard Time, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes: Rue Kream: Parenting a Free Child; An Unschooled Life. I mention it
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/10/2006 4:36:58 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:
Rue Kream: Parenting a Free Child; An Unschooled Life. I mention it
here at least once a day.

This is our new bible. We refer to it daily and hubby and I remind each
other to check the book to see how Rue would handle a particular situation. WWRD
--What Would Rue Do? We are better parents and better people because of this
book. It has also had an unexpected effect in that it has prompted a great
deal of self examination in both my husband and myself. We are questioning
everything. What an incredible journey. Thank you Rue!

Has anyone submitted this book to La Leche League to have it added to the
bibliography? It is in line with LLL Philosophies and we'd love to be able to
carry it in our group libraries. If not, may I submit it?

Warmly,
Robin


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
